name: Maxmee Resort
description:
Stay in the heart of the Gold Coast 

The famous Surfers paradise beach is just a 5 minute walk away when you stay at Maxmee Resort. The resort offers free wifi, a tennis court, outdoor pool and a bar 

The resort also offers table tennis, volley ball and body boards. 
The tour desk cam offer local sightseeing advice and arrange tours. 

Guests have a choice between mixed 4 share dorms. female only 6 share dorms, mixed ,6 and 8 share dorms. Also available are our 2 bedroom self contained apartments offering double triple and twin share options.

For further information please contact the property using the contact details found on the booking confirmation.

Please note the property is closed on Easter Sunday, Christmas Day, Boxing Day and New Years Day.
For more information, please contact the property using the contact details found on the booking confirmation.

You must show an [international passport  only) and credit card upon check-in.

We only accept guests between 18 - 35 years old.  

Please note that children under 18 years of age cannot be accommodated at this hotel.

Please note for bookings of 8 or more guests, different policies and procedures may apply.
For further information please contact the property in advance, using the contact details found on the booking confirmation.

Please note when booking mixed dormitory rooms all beds may not be in the same room.

Please note that Maxmee Resort hostel has a licensed bar. Outside alcohol is prohibited.  

check in 2pm until 9pm
check out 8am until 10am

The property reserves the right to pre-authorize credit cards prior to arrival.

Any cancellations or No shows within our 5-day cancellation policy will be charged the entire stay

Please note refunds are not possible due to delays in transport, weather conditions, health conditions, and arriving after check-in time. 

There is a $20.00 key deposit this is in [cash only]

Please inform Maxmee Resort of your expected arrival time in advance. You can use the special requests box when booking, or contact the property directly using the contact details in your confirmation.

Please note that this property does not have any policies, procedures or resources in place to accommodate the unique needs of school graduates during the annual 'Schoolies Week' period. It does not have adequate resources to engage qualified security personnel to guarantee the safety, comfort and convenience of school graduate guests during this period.

Internet: WiFi is available in all rooms and is free of charge.

Parking: Yes parking is available this can not be reserved

Pets: Pets are not allowed.
